sections.title: Our Areas of Expertise
paragraphs: We provide comprehensive assistance in the following areas:

sections.title: Frequently Asked Questions
paragraphs: How do I start the visa application process?
How long does the visa process take?
What documents do I need?
Do you offer online consultations?
What if my visa is denied?
Contact us via email, phone, or our online form. Schedule a free consultation to discuss your situation and determine the best visa category for you.
Processing times vary depending on the visa type. Most applications take 30-90 days, though some may take longer. We'll provide an estimated timeline after reviewing your case.
Required documents vary by visa type. We'll provide you with a complete checklist during your consultation and assist with preparation.
Yes! We offer consultations via Zoom, Skype, and WhatsApp for clients around the world.
We offer comprehensive appeal services. Let us review the denial and discuss your options for reapplication or appeal.

sections.title: State-specific context
paragraphs: Minas Gerais has a distinct economic and administrative profile. Most immigration registrations occur in Belo Horizonte, and access can vary by city.

sections.title: Decision support
paragraphs: Plan for realistic timelines and ensure documentation matches your stated purpose. Overly optimistic assumptions often lead to delays.

sections.title: What happens next
paragraphs: If you need immigration guidance, prepare your key documents and questions before requesting support.
